entries.title: GOP Congressman Apologizes to Matt Gaetz for 'Losing Temper' on House Floor
entries.description: Video of Representative Mike Rogers being held back after lunging at Gaetz was viewed more than 3.8 million times on social media.

entries.title: Bolsonaro Supporters Storm Brazil's Congress, Echo Jan. 6 Invasion
entries.description: Videos from the scene show an angry mob clashing with law enforcement, and invading and ransacking government buildings.

entries.title: Ex-Army General Blasts Elon Musk Over Tank Remarks: 'Not Today, Satan'
entries.description: The billionaire suggested on Saturday that Ukraine should cease using tanks against Russia because they "are a deathtrap now."

entries.title: Biden Slammed for 'Box-Checking' Trip to Southern Border
entries.description: Biden's visit to El Paso, Texas, didn't appear to quell criticism from Republicans, who were deeply critical of his administration's immigration policies.

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Backtracks Old QAnon Beliefs: 'So Far in the Past'
entries.description: "Like a lot of people today I had easily gotten sucked into some things I'd seen on the internet," the Georgia Republican said Sunday.

entries.title: GOP Congressman Won't Rule Out Investigating Jan. 6 After Phone Seized
entries.description: "I will never quit fighting—no matter what's thrown at me," Scott Perry tweeted on Sunday morning.

entries.title: Trump 'No Longer in Control' Former Congressman Warns After Speaker's Vote
entries.description: Former GOP lawmaker Carlos Curbelo said Sunday that he believed Trump's endorsement only swayed "two or three" holdouts for McCarthy.

entries.title: Ex-Army General Predicts Ukraine Liberates Crimea 'by End of August'
entries.description: Crimea could return to Ukrainian control after nearly a decade under Russian rule, according to Ben Hodges on Saturday.

entries.title: Russia's Cease-Fire Has Ended: This Is Where Fighting Continued

entries.title: Ted Lieu Points Out Jim Jordan Ignored Subpoena as GOP Threatens More
entries.description: The new House GOP leadership has pledged to make extensive use of subpoenas in pursuit of its agenda.

entries.title: Putin's Forces 'Already Lost,' Former Russian Commander Says
entries.description: Igor Girkin questioned on Sunday why Wagner Group leaders allowed their troops "to be wasted so ineptly and fruitlessly" in Bakhmut as the Ukraine war rages on.

entries.title: Bryan Kohberger Had 'Plenty of Time' to Commit Idaho Murders—Ex-FBI Agent

entries.title: Strip Mall Shooting Leaves Two Women Dead, Manhunt Underway
entries.description: Multiple injured people were taken to hospital for treatment after the shooting near Huntsville, Alabama.

entries.title: Russia Deploys 300 Chechen Soldiers to Frontline To Boost Failing Campaign
entries.description: Today's Chechnya is headed up by Kremlin-backed Ramzan Kadyrov, although there are Chechen soldiers present in Ukraine fighting for Kyiv's forces.

entries.title: Woman Whose Divorce Made Adele Cry at Her Concert Reveals All About Grief

entries.title: Owner Captures Bull Terrier's Hilarious Reaction to Playing 'Hide and Seek'
entries.description: The popular clip has 14 million views, and one user said: "Your laugh when he sees you is so wholesome."

entries.title: Bomb Cyclones Slam California: Flood Alerts as 560,000 Homes Without Power

entries.title: Man Dragged for Inappropriate Joke About Adopted Nephew: 'Harsh'
entries.description: "A joke is supposed to be funny. This so-called 'joke' wasn't funny. If the joke is truly funny, people will laugh," said comedy writer Jeffrey L. Gurian.

entries.description: Kevin McCarthy was finally elected as speaker after 15 rounds of ballots.

entries.title: I Pay For All Of My Daughter's Bills, Yet She Never Calls—What Should I Do?
entries.description: "I feel like cutting my daughter off financially—she doesn't seem to mind taking all my financial support, but can't seem to give me the time of day."
